name: D
tagline: 'for Visitor Management' to track your visitors and manage security.
body:
### forVisitor Management app
This app will host your visitors with professional visitor management system. Visitor only need to install forVisitor app.

### Register your company information
  - company Name
  - Logo

### List of visitors
  - Current and previous visitors list

### provide Guest Wi-Fi to visitor
  - configure Wi-Fi information and visitor app will install profile to access guest wi-fi

### Security restrictions
  - If you are working on high security area, you can use it 

### Voice call with your host and information desk

### Checkout with safe of mind
  - remove Guest Wi-Fi and restrictions and checkout 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with apps? Please contact support@honemobile.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
